ygData.subject: Item placement in research tomes
ygData.msgSnippet: I am curious since someone mentioned earlier that the position of items in the tomes has an effect on wheather the research is successful or not, is this
ygData.messageBody:
I am curious since someone mentioned earlier that the position
of items in the tomes has an effect on wheather the research is
successful
or not, is this information true? Can someone confirm this? (I'll be
careful with exact placement inside the research tomes anyway but I am
still curious) If this is true and you have to place the items in the
order they are listed from the recipes inside the research tome for the
spell to be correctly created, what is the slot ordering? I would assume

(based on the way inventory slots work that it is something like:
1 3
2 4
Would be a great help if somone could help me out here, and save me
blowing a my supplys for my first research attempt (just made 16 as a
magician).

Vesuvias Solusek Ro Magician
Commisioned Officer of The Fulcrum
